items.title: Pins Go Boom! makes league season high stats
items.text: Pins Go Boom! team scratch series of 2094 for Week 5 (05 Jun) makes it to League Season High Team Scratch Series at #4. The team also won all 4 points for the week.

items.title: BLS release 0.2.0
items.text: Weekend changes are now available! Multiple changes, around stats, new / updated graphs, and a few utility pages. Boring details at https://github.com/bindul/bls/releases/tag/v-0.2.0
